    • possibleMoves

      public ArrayList<MyPosition> possibleMoves(boardCopy board, boolean noRetritRule)
      This function calculates all the legal moves a MovablePiece can make.

      this method is not abstract because all but one movable piece can move the same so that piece an overwrite it.

      Parameters:
      board - the boardcopy currently in play
      Returns:
      a array of Positions the piece can legally move to using this.position of each piece

    • determineIfAttacking

      public boolean determineIfAttacking(boardCopy board, MyPosition position)
      determines if a player is attacking

      precondition: the move must be legal and the piece must be able to move there, its beter to give possition generated from the possiblemoves function that checks everything

      Parameters:
      board - boardcopy used
      position - that the player wants to move to

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo(MyPosition position, boardCopy board)
      This function moves the movable piece to a different position.

      Parameters:
      position - : The position to move the piece Precondition: The position must be legal.

      Postcondition:Changes the position of the piece
